title: Robert Gordon, Punk Rocker Turned Rockabilly Revivalist, Dies at 75
description: Weary of the angry and aggressive sound of New York’s musical underground of the late 1970s, he returned to rock’s roots and seeded a rockabilly revival.
dc:creator: Alex Williams
media:description: Robert Gordon in 1981. With his 1950s-era sound and his pompadour, he cut an unusual figure in the world of late-1970s rock.
